sentences.english: CONCLUSION Limuliod reagent method can be used to inspect semi-finished product of salvia miltiorrhiza injection.
sentences.chinese: 結論鱟試劑可作爲檢測丹蔘注射液半成品的方法。

sentences.english: However, the habits of horseshoe crabs are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 不過鱟的習性尚未爲人所知。

sentences.english: The crabs were steamed and then ground into meal for the fields.
sentences.chinese: 鱟被蒸熟後作爲土地的餐食撒入土地。

sentences.english: Tadpole shrimp live in seasonal, freshwater ponds.
sentences.chinese: 鱟蟲生活在季節性活水池塘中。

sentences.english: Results The bacterial endotoxins test would not be interfered by the injection.
sentences.chinese: 結果立止血對鱟試劑無干擾作用。

sentences.english: This will be provided a basis for the artificial propagation and artificial releasing of horseshoe crab′s juvenile.
sentences.chinese: 本實驗結果爲鱟苗海區人工增殖放流提供了實驗依據。

sentences.english: Another reference states tadpole shrimp may have been living for 300 million years.
sentences.chinese: 另一個參考認爲鱟蟲也許已經存在了3億年。

definition: obscure variant of 悉[xi1]/Achyranthes bidentata, a root used in Chinese medicine, equivalent to 牛膝[niu2 xi1]
still-born chick (in unhatched egg)/variant of 殰|㱩[du2]
